channel.title: Comments on: SQL Saturday Fun
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the awesome comments on my session! I had a lot of fun doing that one. Just need to shine it up a bit.

And absolutely was great meeting you and a HUGE thank you again for speaking at SQL Saturday.

item.title: By: Brian Davis
item.dc:creator: Brian Davis
item.content:encoded:
Thanks Chrissie, happy to be here!

Jes – Thanks, it was great finally meeting you and Ted in person. I’m looking forward to seeing you and running with you again.

item.title: By: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.dc:creator: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.content:encoded:
Brian, it was great to meet you in Chicago! I can’t wait to see you at another SQL Saturday!

And welcome to LTD!
